resources.string: Member info
Try following the official sporting account.
HOW TO FOLLOW THE OFFICIAL SPORTING ACCOUNT

Welcome to Sport Sidekick! Let’s get started by following the Official Sporting account. Official Accounts are owned by players, managers and other official club representatives, following them will mean that you see their updates on your wall.
Congrats! You are now following the Official Sporting CP account, and their Posts will appear on your Wall.
View your contacts by tapping the Friends icon on the bottom right of the screen.
Tap the Sporting CP avatar to open their details panel.
Tap the Follow toggle ON.
Try join the official sporting chat.
HOW TO JOIN THE OFFICIAL SPORTING CHAT
By joining the Official Sporting Chat, you can chat with club representatives and other fans.
You can now join in on the Official Club Chat whenever you want!
Open the Chat module by tapping the Chat tab on the top right of the screen.
The Sporting Club Chat will already be in your Groups panel along the top of the Chat module.
Tap to open this Chat, say hi to everyone!
Try watch a video on Club TV
HOW TO WATCH A VIDEO ON CLUB TV
Club TV is the place to find Sporting TV shows Here\'s how to watch one.
You can share videos to your Wall and in Chat too.
Open the Club TV module by tapping the Club TV tab in the bottom right of the screen.
Tap a Channel.
Tap a Playlist.
Tap the video you want to watch.
Try view a news article.
HOW TO VIEW A NEWS ARTICLE
Keep up to date with all the latest Sporting news, here\'s how to view an article.
You can share News posts to the Wall or in Chat, or leave a comment under any Post.
Open the News module by tapping the News tab on the top left of the screen.
Tap a News post.
When you\'re finished, you can swipe left or tap the close button to return to all News posts.
Try view a rumour.
HOW TO VIEW RUMOURS
Psst… Have you heard about the Rumours module? It gives you all the gossip on transfers. Here\'s how to view Rumours.
You can share Rumours to the Wall or in Chat.
Open the Rumours module by tapping the Rumours tab on the top left of the screen.
Newest Rumours appear at the top. Tap a Rumour to read more.
Try view stats.
HOW TO VIEW STATS
How many goals has Joel Cambell scored? What are the odds of a win next game? Here\'s how to find and view Stats.
You can share Stats to the Wall or in Chat.
Open the Stats module by tapping the Chat tab on the top right of the screen.
Tap a table to expand it.
Tap any Stat for more details.
Setup your profile.
HOW TO SET UP YOUR PROFILE
Set up your contact info, fill up your Wallet with SSK, and check out your Stash - all from your Profile.
Show off badges in your Stash by sharing them to the Wall or in Chat!
Tap your Profile on the bottom left corner of the screen.
Tap the Edit button to change your contact info.
Tap the Wallet tab to see your SSK and buy more.
Tap the Stash tab to see your collection of badges and achievements.
Try add a friend.
HOW TO ADD A FRIEND
Sport Sidekick is all about your friends! Here\'s how to add a friend.
Sport Sidekick is better with friends! Try adding some more and Following them so that their posts appear on your Wall.
Tap the Friends icon on the bottom right of the screen.
Tap the Add button.
Enter your friend\'s name, email or phone number.
When your friend appears below, tap the Add button.
If your friend isn\'t already on SSK, use the invite tab and enter their email address to send them an invite!
Try creating a chat with your friends.
HOW TO CREATE A CHAT WITH FRIENDS
Chats can be between you and one person or a whole Group. Here\'s how to set up a Chat and say hi to a friend.
As the creator of a Chat you can rename, invite, and block members from that Chat.
Open the Chat module by tapping the Chat tab on the top right of the screen.
Tap the \'Create/Join Chat\' button in the Groups panel.
In the Create a Chat tab, enter a name for your Chat.
Add friends to the Chat by tapping them (tapping them again will remove them).
Chats are PRIVATE by default, if you want to create a PUBLIC chat then tap the toggle (NB. Once a Chat is Private it can not be made Public).
Tap the confirm button and you will be taken to your new Chat!
Try post to the wall.
HOW TO POST TO THE WALL
Posting to the Wall will show up on the Walls of friends who follow you too. Here’s how to do it.
Delete Wall posts by swiping right on them and tapping the \'Delete\' icon.
Open the News module by tapping the News tab on the top left of the screen.
Swipe left on a Wall item to bring up the menu.
Tap the Share icon.
Confirm that you want to post this item to the Wall.
Try video chat with friends.
HOW TO HAVE A VIDEO CHAT WITH FRIENDS
Experience the action together! You can Video Chat with up to 3 friends.\u0020
Goals are better when you can see your friends reactions live!
Open the Video Chat module by tapping the Video Chat tab on the top left of the screen.
Add friends to the Video Chat by tapping them (tapping them again will remove them)
Tap the Call button.
Try pin an item to the wall.
HOW TO PIN AN ITEM TO THE WALL
Love a certain post? Pin it to the top of you wall then!
Congrats! This Wall post will be pinned to the top of your Wall until you delete it. Delete Wall posts by swiping right on them and tapping the \'Delete\' icon.
If you really like a Wall item and want to keep it on your Wall here\'s how to Pin it there. If you don\'t, it will be wiped after a few days. (NB. Pinning items costs SSK)
Open the Wall module by tapping the Wall tab on the top left of the screen.
Swipe left on a Wall item to bring up the menu.
Tap the Pin icon.
Confirm that you want to spend 1 SSK to Pin the item.
Try visit the shop.
HOW TO VISIT THE SHOP
Check out the latest Sporting merchandise in the Shop.
You can Navigate back and forward using the menu at the bottom of the Shop module.
Open the Shop module by tapping the Shop tab on the top left of the screen.
You can Navigate back and forward using the menu at the bottom of the Shop module.
Share with:
